channel.title: People cant join my server plz help me
channel.description: :eek: omg plz help me other people cant join my server only i can when they try to join it says server must be down plz help me anyone :| anyone plz

item.title: People cant join my server plz help me
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

If you are portforwarding then go to www.portforward.com and select the router you are using then select the first option for the game and follow the steps. If you are using hamachi make you created a network so people can join and then go to start>controlpanel>Securitycenter>windowsfirewall and make sure it’s off then go to the exceptions tab and click “Add port” then put hamachi for the name and put the port of your server.

Read full topic
item.source: People cant join my server plz help me
